SINT_Execution_Output.Summary: A new FD and SINT prompt were synthesized under Debates (N=4). The meta-process followed Scenario 3B (Consensus) to maximize clarity and coverage. Four downstream tasks were created with explicit methods for Cases 2â€“5.

Task.title: Gene-Edited Crop Deployment: Safety, Yield, and Public Acceptance
Task.objective: Run a conflict-oriented debate to evaluate trade-offs between accelerated yield gains and biosafety/acceptance constraints for region-wide deployment of gene-edited staple crops.
Task.context: Regulatory approvals, containment protocols, labeling and traceability, agronomic constraints, smallholder vs. industrial scale.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), minimum 2 rounds; require Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Regulatory Bioethics Specialist - Agricultural Systems Engineer - Public Engagement and Risk Communication Lead
Task.constraints: PCG required; numeric ratings (1-10) every round; cross-evaluation; Dual Output with Verification Report.
Task.expected_outcomes: Actionable policy and deployment guidelines balancing yield, risk, and acceptance, with measurable KPIs.

Task.title: Post-Pandemic Rapid Transit Redesign
Task.objective: Integrate ridership recovery, cost control, and reliability into a consensus roadmap for a metropolitan rapid transit network.
Task.context: Peak/off-peak patterns, remote work shifts, maintenance backlogs, fare policies, accessibility, and equity goals.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); no criticism; emphasize integration and prioritization.
Task.experts: - Transit Operations Director - Urban Mobility Planner - Public Finance Analyst
Task.constraints: PCG required; ratings (1-10) and cross-evaluation at Step 2; Dual Output with Verification Report.
Task.expected_outcomes: Prioritized investment and service plan (headways, fleet, maintenance windows) with performance targets.

Task.title: Security Review Protocol for LLM Applications Handling Sensitive Data
Task.objective: Use Generator+Critic to produce a robust application security review protocol tailored to LLM-based systems processing PII and proprietary data.
Task.context: Threat models (prompt injection, data exfiltration), logging and redaction, access control, human-in-the-loop overrides, auditability.
Task.methodology: Generator + External Critic (N=2) with explicit feedback loops; mandatory corrections until constraints satisfied or limit reached.
Task.experts: - Application Security Architect (Generator) - Compliance and Risk Officer (Critic)
Task.constraints: PCG required; numeric ratings (1-10) for risk and coverage; Dual Output with Verification Report.
Task.expected_outcomes: Stepwise review protocol with gates, controls, test cases, red-team hooks, and rollback triggers.

Task.title: Water Allocation Strategy under Multi-Year Drought
Task.objective: Conduct a conflict-oriented debate to derive legally robust and socially acceptable allocation strategies for river-basin water during prolonged drought.
Task.context: Senior/junior water rights, ecological flow requirements, agricultural vs. urban demand, emergency reserves, enforcement capacity.
Task.methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict), at least 2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise synthesis.
Task.experts: - Water Rights Legal Scholar - Agricultural Hydrologist - Municipal Infrastructure Planner - Environmental Conservation Scientist
Task.constraints: PCG required; detailed ratings and cross-evaluation; Dual Output with Verification Report.
Task.expected_outcomes: Ranked portfolio of allocation rules, enforcement mechanisms, and drought stage triggers with KPIs.
